title: Android Tech Lead
resume: My role as Android Tech Lead is to coordinate, plan and deliver new features. Some of my responsibilities are:
resposabilities: Technical design of new features and review technical designs from others, always looking for scalability and sustainability inside the project. Also, share these technical designs to the consumers and negotiate times for its implementation.
Keep the quality of the project using code-review, unit testing, and any kind of tool that could help to keep and improve the quality of the project
Planning and estimate epics, tasks and features in order to complete them successfully every sprint.
Training, mentoring, and coaching the developers to maintain a motivated environment among  the team.
Assist the team to complete every sprint on time.

title: Senior Android Developer
resume: As an Android Developer I was mainly in charge of the design, implementation of new features, bugs fixing and APIs coordination with the backend team

title: Product Engineer
resume: In CodeScrum I was in charge of full projects development, from taking the requirements to deploying the new functionalities

title: Technical advisor
resume: As Technical advisor I was in charge of helping start-ups developing their technological products. I had the oportunity to learn several technologies from the backend, frontend and even mobile side.
